pageProduct.name: Palmers Aloe Vera Gel 125g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Aloe Vera Formula Moisturising Gel is the perfect after-sun product to be used on skin that's been over-exposed to the elements. Formulated with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this gel will leave skin smooth and soft, not sticky. It cools skin on contact, and is perfect for soothing dehydrated skin.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Made with 100% Pure Aloe Vera Gel plus Vitamin E, emollients and stabilisers for purity and efficacy.

Ingredients

Aloe Vera Gel (Aloe Barbadensis), Water (Aqua), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Carbomer, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Methyl Gluceth-20, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Copolymer, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Alcohol Denat., Glycereth-2 Cocoate, Propylene Glycol, Triethanolamine, Fragrance (Parfum), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool.

Directions

Keep a tube in the fridge to apply to skin after over-exposure to the sun.
